iana.encoding_considerations:
while binary is the default, if the charset parameter is set to US-ASCII it is 7-bit text, 
or if it is set to "UTF-8" it is 8-bit text.

iana.template_text:
(Registered 2020-09-29)

Media type name: application

Media subtype name: prs.cyn

Required parameters: none

Optional parameters:
charset - this may be set to any of the following values (without quotes):
"US-ASCII", "UTF-8”.  No particular charset should be
assumed if the parameter is not specified.

Encoding considerations: binary
while binary is the default, if the charset parameter is set to US-ASCII it is 7-bit text, 
or if it is set to "UTF-8" it is 8-bit text.

Security considerations:
not yet assessed

Interoperability considerations:
none

Published specification:
https://cynthia.re/docs/mtcyn

Applications which use this media:
not yet published

Fragment identifier considerations:
none

none

none
